data.name: Beans or Bones Demo
data.detailed_description: This is the free demo for Beans or Bones. It contains the first level of the game and shows some of the game mechanics used. It's a 2-player online co-op game. You need another player to play the game, and an external voice chat (like Discord) to communicate with your fellow co-player.
data.about_the_game: This is the free demo for Beans or Bones. It contains the first level of the game and shows some of the game mechanics used. It's a 2-player online co-op game. You need another player to play the game, and an external voice chat (like Discord) to communicate with your fellow co-player.
